com.giift.sdk.data

Class User

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.giift.sdk.data.User
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.provider.BaseColumns

    public abstract class User
extends java.lang.Object
implements android.provider.BaseColumns
    Data model allowing to manipulate a user representation and it also makes the link with the phone AccountManager

      • GetToken

        public static java.lang.String GetToken(@NonNull
                                        android.content.Context context,
                                        @NonNull
                                        android.accounts.Account acc,
                                        @NonNull
                                        User.SocialProvider provider)
        Try to get the token of a specific account linked to a specific SocialProvider.
        Parameters:
        context - used to access the AccountManager
        acc - account for which we try to get the token
        provider - social media on which we try to get the token
        Returns:
        token if found, null otherwise

        type - the type of account token we try to get
        Returns:

      • RemoveCurrentAccounts

        public static void RemoveCurrentAccounts(@NonNull
                                         android.content.Context context)
        Remove from the phone all accounts linked to Giift.com. Normally there should only be one at a time.
        Parameters:
        context - used to access the AccountManager

      • UpdateAuthentication

        public static void UpdateAuthentication(@NonNull
                                        android.content.Context context,
                                        @NonNull
                                        java.lang.String email,
                                        @NonNull
                                        java.lang.String access_token,
                                        @NonNull
                                        java.lang.String token_type,
                                        long expires_in,
                                        @NonNull
                                        java.lang.String refresh_token)
        This function is used to store the authentication details in the users accounts
        Parameters:
        context - Context
        email - users email id
        access_token - access token returned by server; to be used to make subsequent requests
        token_type - token type e.g: Bearer
        expires_in - time for which the access token is valid in milliseconds
        refresh_token - to be used to get new access token once it expires

      • UpdateRefreshToken

        public static void UpdateRefreshToken(@NonNull
                                      android.content.Context context,
                                      @NonNull
                                      java.lang.String access_token,
                                      @NonNull
                                      java.lang.String token_type,
                                      long expires_in,
                                      @NonNull
                                      java.lang.String refresh_token)
        This function is used to update token data for current account
        Parameters:
        access_token - access token returned by server; to be used to make subsequent requests
        token_type - token type e.g: Bearer
        expires_in - time for which the access token is valid in milliseconds
        refresh_token - to be used to get new access token once it expires

      • UpdateUserProfile

        public static android.net.Uri UpdateUserProfile(android.content.Context context,
                                                org.json.JSONObject user)
        Insert/Update object in the GiiftProvider and in SharedPreferences to displayed in the Profile Fragment This function updates the user data ony if the updated_at field in the json representation of the user object returned is greater than the local updated_at value
        Parameters:
        context - used to access the GiiftProvider
        user - json representation of the user coming from the server (v1 api)
        Returns:
        the uri of the updated/inserted user in the GiiftProvider Json Representation for user should be in accordance with v1 api

      • UpdateUserProfile

        public static android.net.Uri UpdateUserProfile(android.content.Context context,
                                                org.json.JSONObject user,
                                                boolean updateAt)
        Insert/Update object in the GiiftProvider and in SharedPreferences to displayed in the Profile Fragment.
        Parameters:
        context - used to access the GiiftProvider
        user - json representation of the user coming from the server (v1 api)
        updateAt - whether updated at must be checked ; if false the user data is updated in the database without this check
        Returns:
        the uri of the updated/inserted user in the GiiftProvider Json Representation for user should be in accordance with v1 api

      • UpdateUserProfile

        public static android.net.Uri UpdateUserProfile(android.content.Context context,
                                                org.json.JSONObject user,
                                                boolean updateAt,
                                                int version)
        Insert/Update object in the GiiftProvider and in SharedPreferences to displayed in the Profile Fragment.
        Parameters:
        context - used to access the GiiftProvider
        user - json representation of the user coming from the server (v1 api)
        updateAt - whether updated at must be checked ; if false the user data is updated in the database without this check
        Returns:
        the uri of the updated/inserted user in the GiiftProvider

      • SetUserData

        public static boolean SetUserData(@NonNull
                                  android.content.Context context,
                                  @NonNull
                                  java.lang.String key,
                                  @NonNull
                                  java.lang.String value)
        This method sets userdata i.e (key, value) pair for users account
        Parameters:
        context - Context; should not be null
        key - key to be used; should not be null
        value - value corresponding to the key; should not be null
        Returns:
        true if account data could be set, else false

                                                     @NonNull
                                                     java.lang.String key)
        Gets the user data named by "key" associated with the account.
        Parameters:
        context - Context
        key - key for which value has to be returned
        Returns:
        value for key if available else null
